name: Specu-Mission
description:
Left-click inside the game window above to enable keyboard input.

It's very short, with only two levels. Summited for Winter Game Jam (Private for fun Jam) where the theme is “Color Changes Everything”. 

Created By: Keith McLeod (December 17th to 18th).

Music By: Defrini (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/defrini/)

For improved full-screen visuals download the installer (Windows only). Download link is at the bottom of this page.

ControlsMovementWASDAttack (soldier only)Arrow KeysChange PlayersSpacebarFollow CommandF

FAQ (SPOILERS)

Q - Why doesn't the boss take damage?

A - It has a weakness. Look carefully.

Q - How can I play in full-screen?

A - Either zoom-in on this page (fuzzy results), or download the installer for Windows (better results).
